scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-array:d3,vega-dataflow:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega -o build/vega-crossfilter.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-crossfilter.js -c -m -o build/vega-crossfilter.min.js
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-crossfilter.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-crossfilter.js build/vega-crossfilter.min.js
